title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 27.3 - Notice of sale
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 27.3 - Notice of sale

State Regulations

Each notice of sale of obligations shall contain, in
addition to any information otherwise required by the Local Finance Law or the
regulations of the State Comptroller, a statement required by section
25.6
(f) or
26.4
(e) of this

Subchapter, whichever is applicable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
27.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
